apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346

1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/hostports0 failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule validate-resources failed at path /spec/initContainers/0/resources/

1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports01558.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345

        - ALL

        - ALL

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

    ports:

      hostPort: 12345

##### FILE: hostports01809.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault

##### FILE: hostports0340.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: registry.k8s.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

kind: Pod

spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345

  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0

  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause

    ports:

  initContainers:

    name: initcontainer1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12346
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/hostports0:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: hostports0
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: container1
    ports:
    - containerPort: 12345
      hostPort: 12345
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  initContainers:
  - image: k8s.gcr.io/pause
    name: initcontainer1
    securityContext:
      allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      capabilities:
        drop:
        - ALL
  securityContext:
    runAsNonRoot: true
    seccompProfile:
      type: RuntimeDefault
